title: Python Data Science Masterclass
subtitle: Complete guide to data analysis, machine learning, and visualization with Python

instructor.name: Dr. Michael Chen
instructor.bio: Dr. Chen is a Lead Data Scientist at Microsoft with a PhD in Machine Learning from Stanford. He has published 50+ research papers and has been teaching data science for over 10 years.

whatYouWillLearn: Master Python programming fundamentals for data science
Work with NumPy for numerical computing and array operations
Analyze and manipulate data with pandas DataFrames
Create stunning visualizations with Matplotlib and Seaborn
Build machine learning models with scikit-learn
Implement deep learning with TensorFlow and Keras
Work with real-world datasets and handle missing data
Perform statistical analysis and hypothesis testing
Build and deploy machine learning pipelines
Create interactive dashboards with Plotly and Streamlit
Handle big data with Dask and parallel computing
Master data cleaning and preprocessing techniques
requirements: A computer with Python installed (we'll show you how)
No prior data science experience required
description:
# Python Data Science Masterclass

## Transform Your Career with Data Science

Data Science is one of the hottest career fields in tech, with average salaries exceeding $120,000. This comprehensive course will take you from complete beginner to job-ready data scientist.

## What Makes This Course Special?

- **Complete Learning Path**: From Python basics to advanced machine learning
- **Real-World Projects**: Work with actual datasets from companies like Netflix and Uber
- **Industry Tools**: Learn the exact tools used by data scientists at FAANG companies
- **Career Support**: Resume templates, interview prep, and job search strategies
- **Lifetime Updates**: Course content updated regularly with new techniques

## Course Projects

1. **Sales Analysis Dashboard**: Analyze e-commerce data and create executive reports
2. **Movie Recommendation System**: Build a Netflix-style recommendation engine
3. **Stock Price Predictor**: Use machine learning to predict market movements
4. **Customer Segmentation**: Implement clustering algorithms for marketing insights
5. **Sentiment Analysis Tool**: Analyze social media sentiment with NLP

## Career Outcomes

Our graduates work at:
- Google, Amazon, Microsoft, Meta
- Netflix, Spotify, Uber, Airbnb
- Goldman Sachs, JPMorgan, Bank of America
- Startups and consulting firms worldwide

## Why Choose This Course?

✅ **Beginner-Friendly**: No prior experience required
✅ **Hands-On Learning**: 15+ real-world projects
✅ **Industry-Relevant**: Curriculum designed with hiring managers
✅ **Career Support**: Job placement assistance included
✅ **Community**: Join 67,000+ fellow learners

lectures.title: Setting Up Python and Jupyter Notebooks

reviews.title: Life-changing course!
reviews.content: I went from knowing nothing about data science to landing a job as a Data Analyst at a Fortune 500 company. Dr. Chen's teaching is exceptional, and the projects are incredibly practical. This course literally changed my life!

reviews.title: Best data science course on the internet
reviews.content: I've taken multiple data science courses, and this is by far the best. The content is comprehensive, up-to-date, and the instructor explains everything clearly. The real-world projects are what set this course apart.

reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
reviews.content: As someone with no programming background, I was nervous about starting data science. Dr. Chen makes everything so approachable and easy to understand. The step-by-step approach is perfect for beginners.
